member.summary: Add the drag/dropped files to the listbox

members.member:
If a file in the list box is selected, display the hash hex string for that file
A Default object sender
A Default event args

If the hash algorithm is changed, display the hash hex string for the currently selected file (if applicable)
A Default object sender
A Default event args

member.summary: Provide feedback for the user if the hashes match

member.summary: Provide feedback for the user if the hashes match

member.summary: Returns the enum of the currently selected hash algorithm
member.returns: A The currently selected hash algorithm

member.summary: Compute the hash of the given file with the given hash algorithm
member.param: A The path to the file to hash
member.returns: A The hex string of the hash

member.summary: Computes the hash of the currently selected file and returns its hex string in the txtGenHash text box
member.param: A The hash function to use

member.summary: Returns the hexadecimal string conversion of the byte array
member.param: A The byte array to convert

member.summary: Writes the hash string results of fileToHash of the compression functions to hashFile

A The file to write the hashes to
